entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Stettler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stettler 3:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -10.7°C
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
